comments.author: steve.england@gmail.com

comments.text: No, direct connect to the internet.  I have a router and Zone Alarm.  This started happening when I updated to 2.0, as described by the original poster.  Once or twice it has resolved and given me the actual web page (after a very very very long time).  I do not have this problem with mapquest if I use IE (blech).  Comment #5 is no longer an issue.  I clicked the link I posted and everything came up just fine.
comments.raw_text: No, direct connect to the internet.  I have a router and Zone Alarm.  This started happening when I updated to 2.0, as described by the original poster.  Once or twice it has resolved and given me the actual web page (after a very very very long time).  I do not have this problem with mapquest if I use IE (blech).  Comment #5 is no longer an issue.  I clicked the link I posted and everything came up just fine.
comments.creator: justjo@mchsi.com
comments.author: justjo@mchsi.com

comments.text:
Try turning off Zone Alarm temporarily and see if that makes it work.
We have many reports where it turns out the problem is caused by Zone Alarm.
(eg. bug 370351, bug 176008, bug 139053 etc)
comments.raw_text:
Try turning off Zone Alarm temporarily and see if that makes it work.
We have many reports where it turns out the problem is caused by Zone Alarm.
(eg. bug 370351, bug 176008, bug 139053 etc)
comments.creator: mats@mozilla.com
comments.author: mats@mozilla.com
justjo@mchsi.com
comments.creator: justjo@mchsi.com
comments.raw_text: Well, by golly, turning off Zone Alarm does make it work.  I then restarted Zone Alarm, and tried the address for which I had already retrieved the map.  I was able to retrieve it. But using another address, I was not able to.  I guess Zone Alarm doesn't like Mapquest.  I haven't had any problems with Google Maps.  I don't suppose you have any idea whether the Zone Alarm people are aware of this problem?
comments.text: Well, by golly, turning off Zone Alarm does make it work.  I then restarted Zone Alarm, and tried the address for which I had already retrieved the map.  I was able to retrieve it. But using another address, I was not able to.  I guess Zone Alarm doesn't like Mapquest.  I haven't had any problems with Google Maps.  I don't suppose you have any idea whether the Zone Alarm people are aware of this problem?

(In reply to comment #10)
>  I don't suppose you have any idea whether the Zone Alarm people are aware of
> this problem?

I have no idea, but please report it as a bug to them.  Hopefully it will
lead to better support for Firefox if enough people complain about it.

-> INVALID (bug is in Zone Alarm)
